price: As for those who follow guidance, He increases them in guidance and blesses them with righteousness[12].
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ زَادَهُمۡ هُدٗى وَءَاتَىٰهُمۡ تَقۡوَىٰهُمۡ
footnotes: [12] Taqwā: It means piety, fear and consciousness of Allah, and care to avoid displeasing Him.
